phrases: We show no mercy to those who defile this knoll, Ainsworth.
What do you intend to do in that vile state, you half-made monster?
You call yourself a mage, but you are now far removed from both us and the humans.
Are you going to become a freak of obsession?
Surrogate eyes, surrogate ears, surrogate mouth.
Losing a branch does not hurt a tree.
You say you do not want to be pitied,
but forgive me for pitying you regardless.
She has left you, has not she?
You were the one who said you would stay with me until I was done with you.
You are very much human, but the way you love is like us.
You should not fight with your spouse,
though at times it may be necessary.
If you are going to chase after her, we will both help you, my beloved child.
It takes only an instant for a human to die.
Titania's brief lovers died the moment she took her eyes off of them.
you must keep her from going outside, so that she will not escape.
We will find her and bring her back to you.
And we will all live in the land of endless youth.
She thinks the way I do.
But that is the way we are.
It is part of who you are, too.
You cannot be the only one who changes the way you love.
in order to live with her...
If Chise will touch me again...
I have to rethink my ways.
Ruth, do you know where Chise is?
I cannot get close to her.
Why do you think I bothered to extend my branches, boys?
The branches of my body extend to the goddess Morrigan.
You may not like it, but you are still my beloved children.
To atone for my inability to keep from pitying you, I shall give you my assistance.
Wrap your thorns around my branches.
Let us bring your mate home.
That queen really does not know how to ask for a favor.
Deposit the massage fee here, please.
What did you tell those two?
That we must know the ways of hurting them, in order that we do not.
How much of a saint do you have to be?!
Quit worrying about some strangers and care more for yourself!
I will leave the coven, too.
You will be better off without a troublemaker like me.
You are still a child if you think you are the only one who is lonely.
Do what needs to be done.
If you were the one who created the opportunity, it is your duty to help them.
It is that lowly gravedigger's brat.
I heard he talks to the dead.
I heard that he uses some twisted sorcery.
You are a witch's child, are not you?
let us leave this stupid village and travel together.
And let us live happily together.
Why do you neither get better nor worse?!
No one else has ever asked a foul gravedigger like me to help them.
I just want to live a good life.
How did I not notice something so simple?
You do not die, no matter what.
We just have to become one.
Cartaphilus, let us be saved together.
This person's alive, even in that state?
It is an old, powerful curse.
Why do you say my name?
Was not that the one who threw a rock at the Son of God and got cursed for it?
We just want to be saved.
How long is it going to hurt?
How long do we have to live in pain?
His memories flow into me because we are connected.
Why do you look at me like that?
All I need is your arm.
Do not call me by that name!
My queen, I trust this ends your whimsical matters.
Come on, Chise, let us go home.
You all ought to see what it is like
to decay for two thousand years,
What exactly is going on here?
This guy showed up out of nowhere and said you are in danger.
Wait, what did you do to your eye?
This happens whenever it is about to work.
This was the best it is gone in decades!
Now, Chise, let us go home.
Why do I have to live through this?!
What did I do to deserve this?!
As many as he is stitched together.
How long do I have to suffer for a crime I do not even remember?
Shit, how many of them are there?
They will not all fit in Hell.
He is trying to escape through another channel.
Sorry, there is something I need to do.
Or are you okay with losing her when she is out of your reach?
Hey, girl, give me some of your magic.
I smell the scent of flames from your soul.
I would not mind getting you across the river in return.
Hey, watch where you are going!
You cannot come into an alleyway like this.
You have gotten even worse than before.
Sorry, but I need to go after him.
This is my way of apologizing.
I am really angry at you, still.
I want you to make up for it.
I want you to help with something.
But for that, I need you to keep a promise.
Will she bring an end to the unending suffering in the city of London, where it all began?
